data.author: Jawaharlal Nehru
data.quote: Democracy is good. I say this because other systems are worse.

data.author: Sardar Patel
data.quote: No one would starve in independent India. Its grain would not be exported. Cloth would not be imported by it. Its leaders would not use a foreign language and finding justice in it would be neither costly nor difficult.

data.author: Indira Gandhi
data.quote: You must learn to be still in the midst of activity and to be vibrantly alive in repose.

data.author: Dhyan Chand
data.quote: I was assured of a place in the team without trials, but I had a feeling it was not fair…when many of my friends were fighting badly for a place and had to prove their mettle in the inter-provincial tournament.

data.author: Mulk Raj Anand
data.quote: No apology is necessary for being truthful to the echoes of one’s mother tongue.

data.author: Mother Teresa
data.quote: The biggest problem in the world today is not poverty or disease but the lack of love and charity and the feeling of being unwanted.

data.author: Bal Gangadhara Tilak
data.quote: After all, our Killers are our …Brothers!!??

data.author: Swami Vivekananda
data.quote: Education is the manifestation of perfection already in a man.

data.author: Arundhati Roy
data.quote: The mullahs of the Islamic world and the mullahs of the Hindu world and the mullahs of the Christian world are all on the same side. And we are against them all.

data.author: Sardar Patel
data.quote: Even if we lose the wealth of thousands, and our life is sacrificed, we…should keep smiling and be cheerful keeping our faith in God and Truth.

data.author: Sri Ramakrishna Paramahamsa
data.quote: The world is not impermanent if one lives there after knowing God.

data.author: Subhash chandra bose
data.quote: No real change in history has ever been achieved by discussions.

data.author: Bhagat Singh
data.quote: The aim of life is no more to control the mind, but to develop it harmoniously; not to achieve salvation here after, but to make the best use of it here below

data.author: Sunil Gavaskar
data.quote: Why talk of the team when our Cricket Board is like an exclusive club with members being there for years on end? If they can stay on without performing, the players too feel they can stay in the team without too big a performance.

data.author: Shiv Khera
data.quote: Winners don’t do different things; they do things differently

data.author: Michael Phelps
data.quote: The more you dream, the farther you get.

data.author: Robert Frost
data.quote: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.

data.author: Stephen C. Hogan
data.quote: You can't have a million-dollar dream with a minimum-wage work ethic.

data.author: George Bernard Shaw
data.quote: When I was young, I observed that nine out of 10 things I did were failures. So I did 10 times more work.

data.author: Henry Rollins
data.quote: If you have an idea of what you want to do in your future, you must go at it with almost monastic obsession, be it music, the ballet or just a basic degree. You have to go at it single-mindedly and let nothing get in your way.
